scripts.build: npm run -s build-proto && npm run -s build-extension
scripts.build-proto: rm -rf proto/ && mkdir -p proto/ && grpc_tools_node_protoc --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:proto/ --plugin=protoc-gen-ts=node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts --ts_out=proto/ --plugin=protoc-gen-bxpb=node_modules/.bin/bxpb-protoc-plugin --bxpb_out=proto/ greeter.proto
